title: runes
body:
can anyone write down some basic ad, ap and tank rune pages?

Much appreciated

replies.body:
AD: AD Marks. Armour Seals. MR Glyphs. AD Quints. Costs 4,290 IP

AP: Magic Pen Marks. Armour Seals. MR Glyphs. AP Quints. Costs: 5217 IP.

These are the 2 basic ones. Since you use the same seals and glyphs in these pages, the total for both pages is only about 7671 IP. Make sure you buy Tier 3 runes.

"Tank" pages can vary alot depending on the tank. Some like AD Marks some like AS Quints or HP Regen quints. But a very basic (and cheap) page is as follows. 

Tank: Armour Marks. HP Seals. MR Glyphs. Armour Quints.

To save IP you can just use AD marks instead if you dont want to buy the extra armour. Also tanks may sometimes use scaling runes instead of flat but again it depends on who you play and who you play against.

For ADCs and other auto based champs (like Jax, Irelia etc) you use the same AD page as before but swap the quints for Attack Speed ones.

ADC: AD Marks. Armour Seals. MR Glyphs. AS Quints.
Don't bother, they are updating the whole thing shortly anyway and it will be a wasted investment, just buy the super cheap 1 tier 2 (70% strength of tier 3) or get the 1/2 price ones and use those.

Tank. Ad reds. Armour yellow. Scailing mr blue. Armour quints.

Ad. Attack speed reds. Armour yellows. Scailing mr blue. Ad quints.

Ap. Magic pen reds. Armour yellow. Scailing or flat mr blue. AP quints.

They are my basics. There are variations i run too but these are my most used i guess.
